cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.trajectory: accelerating west-northwest through the southwest Atlantic, then bending northwest toward the South‐North Carolina coast late Wednesday–Thursday

weather_observation.impacted_coast: South Carolina through North Carolina with peripheral effects southward to coastal Georgia
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts possible Thursday–Friday as Florence passes well to the north
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal flooding or elevated tides possible mainly from long-period swells; significant surge not expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could drop 1–3 inches of rain Thursday–Friday
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents beginning mid-week
